resources.string:
Expose phone to different sources of light… (Outdoors / Torch / Cover screen with hand)

 100 to 400 - Office Lighting
 400 to 4000 - Outdoors (Overcast)
 4000 to 20,000 - Outdoors (Sunny)
 20,000 to 100,000 - Direct Sunlight
Cover the front camera\'s sensor with your hand or an object…
